definition.text: In order to manage contributions from within the app, you first need to provide your Github.com credentials so that we can get authenticated when pushing your changes to the remote repository.

paragraphs.text: Github Crendentials are Missing. Please solve this issue and try again.
At the root folder of Superalgos, you will find a JSON file called Github.json. Please open it with a simple text editor like notepad and configure there your Github credentials.
